description: Factor n, divide sum of divisors by number of divisors; append n to sequence if quotient is integral and not previously seen.
example: a(3)=20; for n=20 the sum of divisors is 42; number of divisors is 6; 42/6=7. The quotient 7 is the mean divisor and this is the first time that 7 has occurred.
crossrefs: Gives first occurrence of terms in A023883. Cf. A048748.
author: _Enoch Haga_
